oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Convention of Cotton Planters
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sketches; cotton; coventions; agriculture; Morehead, E. C.; portraits; 1880s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Convention of Cotton Planters, Memphis, Tenneessee." Sketch from the June 25, 1881 issue of Harper's Weekly shows delegates, state banners and an inset of E. C. Morehead.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anderson, Frederick T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Illustrations from Harper's Weekly Newspaper and Frank Leslie's Illustrated Newspaper
